name: Mercedes-Benz GLC
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz GLC, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 74.45  - 75.45 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants, with engine options ranging from 1993 to 1999 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. GLC has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 7 airbags. Mercedes-Benz GLC is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 14.72 to 19.47 kmpl for GLC.

variants.variant_name: GLC 300 4MATIC 1999 cc, Petrol, Automatic (TC), 14.72 kmpl, 255 bhp
GLC 220d 4MATIC 1993 cc, Diesel, Automatic (TC), 19.47 kmpl, 194 bhp
